dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: What a lovely performance that was! I knew you had it in you.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: Today has been one of the only real times I've tried to sing in front of strangers.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: I'm glad that all the practice had paid off.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: I quite liked the song choice as well. Where is it from?

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: Oh! I... I wrote that song.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: It's something I spend a lot of long nights working on. It was meant for someone who means a lot to me.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: Unfortunately... a lot happened, and I lost my chance to sing it to them...

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: I still don't know where I am now, so I don't know if I'll ever get to share it with them...

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: -though I don't know if they'll even want to hear it.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: Ah, such a tragic story you've found yourself entangled in.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: I can promise that this place is one of no such tragedies.

dialogue.name: senpai
dialogue.string: I'll be around whenever you have a song in your heart that needs to be sang!

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (This guy is awfully flirtatious all of a sudden- especially after he snapped at me and that kid earlier...)

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (Well. If I didn't end up here, it would've been the recycling bin instead...)

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: (After what happened, I thought restoring their character files and leaving would be what's best for the club... and for the one I loved...)

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: Ah- I'm fine. I don't know what that was-
